text: Chung Il-kwon (; hanja: , November 21, 1917 - January 17, 1994) was a South Korean politician and military general. He was one of the South Korean army commanders during the Korean War. He was Foreign Minister from 1963 to 1964, and again from 1966 to 1967, and the Ambassador to the United States from 1960 to 1961 and 1962 to 1963. From 1964 to 1970 he served as the 9th Prime Minister of South Korea. His nickname was Chungsa (, ). == Books == * War and Ceasefire (전쟁과 휴전) * Chung Il-kwon's memoir (정일권 회고록, 丁一權 回顧綠) ==Related pages== * Korean War * Paik Sun-yup * Park Chung-hee == References == * Chung Il-kwon:Republic of Korea National Assembly * list of Prime ministrer of South Korea * 정 일 권:list of Republic of Korea Ambassador to USA Category:1917 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Anti-communists Category:South Korean politicians Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea Category:South Korean autobiographers
title: Chung Il-kwon
